column2: The executive does not need to cater to the popular will of the people, popular elections either do not happen, or do not matter.
The executive is decided in the parliament, with the Monarch or President having very limited political power or impact, if any.
The government provides no additional support to research projects.
Whether due to lack of money, political will, or ability, only small funds are available for research. NOTE: Advance these reforms via the decision. Can only roll these back manually.
The government provides funding for public and private research initiatives.
High priority and significant funds are given to private and public institutions carrying out research.
